mapper.select: SELECT ROUND((SELECT COUNT(d1.discover_id) FROM represent_discover d1 WHERE d1.`status` = 3) / COUNT(discover_id) *100,2) AS assignRate FROM represent_discover d

select discover_id, title, content,pic_urls, discover_type, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, address, location, reply, rate, send_user_id, receive_user_id, status, process_type, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='double_process_type' AND d.dict_value = di.process_type)as processTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='double_process_type' AND d.dict_value = di.status)as statusName, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = send_user_id)AS sendUserName, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = receive_user_id)AS receiveUserName from represent_discover di where di.discover_id = #{discoverId}

select discover_id, title, content,pic_urls, discover_type, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, address, location, status, reply, rate, send_user_id, receive_user_id,process_type, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = send_user_id)AS sendUserName, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = receive_user_id)AS receiveUserName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_type' AND d.dict_value = a.discover_type)AS discoverTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_status' AND d.dict_value = a.status )AS discoverStatusName from represent_discover a where discover_id = #{discoverId}

SELECT COUNT(discover_id)as total, SUM(if(status=1 ,1,0))AS jiaoTotal, SUM(if(status=2 ,1,0))AS jieTotal, SUM(if(status=3 ,1,0))AS pingTotal, SUM(if(status=4 ,1,0))AS yiTotal FROM represent_discover WHERE `status` != 5
SELECT COUNT(discover_id)as total FROM represent_discover WHERE `status` != 5

SELECT d.discover_id, d.title, d.content, d.discover_type, d.remark, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.create_by, d.address, d.location, d.reply, d.rate, d.send_user_id, d.receive_user_id, d.status, d.process_type, d.pic_urls, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = d.send_user_id)AS sendUserName, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = d.receive_user_id)AS receiveUserName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_process_type' AND d.dict_value = d.process_type)AS processTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_type' AND d.dict_value = d.discover_type)AS discoverTypeName, (SELECT d1.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d1 WHERE d1.dict_type='discover_status' AND d1.dict_value = d.status )AS statusName FROM represent_discover d LEFT JOIN represent_discover_track t ON d.discover_id = t.discover_id WHERE t.send_user_id = #{sendUserId} and (d.`status` != 1 or d.process_type != 1) GROUP BY d.discover_id ORDER BY d.create_time DESC

select discover_id, title, content,pic_urls, discover_type, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, address, location, reply, rate, send_user_id, receive_user_id, status, process_type, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = send_user_id)AS sendUserName, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id = receive_user_id)AS receiveUserName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_process_type' AND d.dict_value = a.process_type)AS processTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_type' AND d.dict_value = a.discover_type)AS discoverTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_status' AND d.dict_value = a.status )AS discoverStatusName from represent_discover a
a.station_id = #{stationId}

SELECT (SELECT u.nick_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id =r.send_user_id) AS nickName, (SELECT a.short_name FROM represent_home_access a WHERE a.access_id = r.station_id) AS accessName, COUNT(send_user_id)AS ranking FROM represent_discover r GROUP BY send_user_id ORDER BY ranking DESC

SELECT a.short_name AS accessName, COUNT(station_id)AS ranking, COUNT(DISTINCT r.send_user_id)AS canyuCount, (SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.contact_station_id = r.station_id AND u.del_flag = '0')AS contactCount, CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT r.send_user_id) /(SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.contact_station_id = r.station_id AND u.del_flag = '0'),2),'')AS baifenlv FROM represent_discover r LEFT JOIN represent_home_access a ON a.access_id = r.station_id WHERE a.`level` != 0 GROUP BY r.station_id ORDER BY ranking DESC

SELECT (SELECT a.short_name FROM represent_home_access a WHERE a.access_id = r.station_id) AS accessName, COUNT(station_id)AS ranking, COUNT(DISTINCT r.send_user_id)AS canyuCount, (SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.contact_station_id = r.station_id AND u.del_flag = '0')AS contactCount, CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT r.send_user_id) /(SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.contact_station_id = r.station_id AND u.del_flag = '0'),2),'')AS baifenlv FROM represent_discover r GROUP BY r.station_id ORDER BY baifenlv DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT send_user_id) AS CanRenCount, (SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.`user_type` & 1 > 0 and u.del_flag = '0')AS RenCount, CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT send_user_id) /(SELECT COUNT(u.user_id) FROM sys_user u WHERE u.`user_type` & 1 > 0 and u.del_flag = '0'),2),'')AS baifenlv FROM represent_discover r

SELECT (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='discover_type' AND d.dict_value = a.discover_type)AS discoverTypeName,a.create_time as createTime FROM represent_discover a WHERE a.`status` = 3 AND a.receive_user_id = #{receiveUserId}
